action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: books
RIGHT: bowl
TOP: suit
BOTTOM: spoons
CENTER: nuts
NORTHWEST: bolt
NORTHEAST: narcissus
SOUTHWEST: violet
SOUTHEAST: copper
HERE: tiger
THERE: camellia
NOWHERE: eye shadow
EVERYWHERE: ladder
INSIDE: chalk
OUTSIDE: tambourine

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: no<|im_end|><|im_end|><|im_end|>  

ASIDE: The questioner does not know that there are books on the left.<|im_end|><|im_end|>  

QUESTIONER: What is on your right?<|im_end|><|im_end|>  

ANSWER: A bowl is on your right.<|im_end|><|im_end|>  

ASIDE: The presence of a bowl on the right indicates that the questioner is likely in a kitchen or a room with a similar function.<|im_end|><|im_end|>
